column4: what packages are out there for a really lightweight DE, or WM?  I have a new(er) laptop but goddamn gnome is really choppy
what packages are out there for a really lightweight DE, or WM?  I have a new(er) laptop but goddamn gnome is really choppy
Well, Xfce is pretty light, if you like an interface similar to GNOME, but it's less resource-heavy. It's in xubuntu-desktop
Alternatively, there's openbox or icewm and similar, which require a fair bit of configuration before you'll enjoy them properly. But they are indeed lighter.
